CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.10.2.2a, parentage (2N) AND B.1.10.2.2b, parentageunit (3N) --> Value should be 801 (year)
E2B (R3): D.10.2.2a Age of Parent (number) Conformance: Optional, but required if D.10.2.2b is populated. Data Type: 3N OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date of birth should be used if the precise birthday is known; otherwise the age should be used.
CustomField.label: Parent Age (Years)
